mapper.select: SELECT title, description AS content FROM course WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT c.course_id AS courseId, c.title, c.price, c.thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, c.status, count(pd.pay_detail_id) AS salesCount FROM course c JOIN payment_detail pd ON c.course_id = pd.course_id WHERE c.delete_flg = 0 AND c.status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY c.course_id ORDER BY salesCount DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT course_id, title, thumbnail_url, detail_img_url FROM course WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
